cause.description:
Encouraging violence prevention through individual action, our purpose is to “never forget” the victims, honoring their memory through art in action, pledging peaceful resolution in times of conflict.
1. Let peace begin with my own actions.
2. Create events to honor victims of school violence and create awareness.
3. Encourage voter registration and active participation as concerned citizens.
cause.mission: To choose peaceful resolution in our own lives when faced with conflict to honor the memory of all victims of school violence.
cause.name: Stop School Violence!
